name: Starlight Divide
description:
Story

The Divide-- a world where, having been abandoned by the Creator, Heaven and Hell have been sewn together. Follow the story of two angels: one who's gone renegade in a realm of demons, and the other on a journey to earn her wings.

Game

Starlight Divide challenges long-standing flaws of the tRPG genre by removing RNG from the equation entirely. Earn hits and dodge attacks not by the roll of the dice, but by your own skill in a timed combat. Claw your way to victory with precision and strategy!

Demo Available

This demo version is a small taste of a greater story and system, with the full game planned to have no shortage of additional features to support a full campaign and episodic saga.
